abstract: <jats:p><jats:italic>Lafontaineana</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>gen. nov.</jats:bold>is proposed as a new Neotropical genus of Pantheinae, forming a sister group to<jats:italic>Gaujonia</jats:italic>Dognin, 1891 based on a phylogenetic analysis. In addition, one new combination and four new species are proposed:<jats:italic>Lafontaineana marmorifera</jats:italic>(Walker, 1865),<jats:bold>comb. nov.</jats:bold>(Colombia),<jats:italic>Lafontaineana alexandrae</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Ecuador),<jats:italic>Lafontaineana imama</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Colombia),<jats:italic>Lafontaineana puma</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Ecuador), and<jats:italic>Lafontaineana thuta</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>(Ecuador). Two new Neotropical species of<jats:italic>Panthea</jats:italic>are described,<jats:italic>Panthea hondurensis</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold>and<jats:italic>Panthea taina</jats:italic>Martinez,<jats:bold>sp. nov.</jats:bold></jats:p>
title: A new Andean genus, Lafontaineana, with descriptions of four new species and two new Neotropical species of Panthea (Noctuidae, Pantheinae)

reference.author: Herrich-Schäffer
reference.journal-title: Sammlung neuer oder wenig bekannter aussereuropäischer Schmetterlinge. Manz, G.J.
